short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides support for exporting workouts into .zwo for use in Zwift

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a way for you to easily export your TrainerRoad workouts to the Zwift workout format (.zwo) automatically, so it can be imported into Zwift and used as a custom workout within Zwift. This is a must-have for anyone using TrainerRoad for your cycling training, but want the immersive experience of Zwift to complete the workouts in. This will save you the tedious step of hand-building your TR workouts in Zwift -- it's just as easy as a click and a drag into the right folder before you launch Zwift!
